LanguageData.InhumanizeCompleteText: {INVOKER_nameDef} has finished performing {RITUAL_definite} ritual, chaotically inhumanizing {TARGET_nameDef}'s mind.
LanguageData.InhumanizeMentalBreak: {TARGET_pronoun} is now experiencing a break of humanity.
LanguageData.InhumanizeTargetComa: {TARGET_pronoun} will remain in a coma for {1}.
